flawed_nl_solution:
The pages she has left to read by Thursday are P + 2P = 3P = 158 - 23 - 38 - 61 = 39 pages.
Therefore, to finish the book on Friday, Cora has to read P = 39 / 3 = <<39/3=13>>13 pages on Thursday.
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 39. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
